Text: BPI FOUNDATION'S PAGPUGAY SCHOLARSHIP FUND — COLLEGE, Link: No link found
Sponsor:BPI Foundation

Description:The BPI Foundation (BPIF) recognizes the great contribution of the medical front-liners in the fight against COVID-19. To honor their heroic efforts, BPIF offers Pagpugay, a scholarship fund program to support the next of kin of the medical front-liners who passed away in the line of duty against COVID-19. Scholarship grants are subject to the availability of slots.
Scholarship Eligibility:
If the deceased is married, the priority beneficiary is the children. If single, the beneficiary can be next of kin up to the 2nd degree of consanguinity.
